title: The Game Awards Confirms Kojima, Sifu Studio & More - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.12.24
description:

https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/

Still Wakes the Deep is currently 35% off on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5 – buy today, and add some horror to your holidays. https://stillwakesthedeep.com/

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $35-off Aura’s best-selling Carver Mat frames

Could we get a Sifu sequel, What is Kojima hiding, and the first big leak from The Game Awards has already happened.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
The STREAM is Mike and Nick getting hyped for The Game Awards
After that is our Live Reactions
After that is our Gamescast break down
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway about why we don’t do a physical Game of the Year trophy
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs
